typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_productid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_productid as string,
		productnumber as string,
		productname as string,
		BK_family as string,
		standarcost as decimal(19,4),
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_productid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		productnumber as string,
		productname as string,
		SK_family as integer,
		standarcost as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
source(output(
		SK_productfamilyid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_productfamilyid as string,
		productnumber as string,
		productname as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductFamilies
STG derive(STGHASH = crc32(512,toString(productname),toString(productnumber),toInteger(toString(standarcost),'############'),upper(toString(BK_family)))) ~> STGHASH
STGHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_productid == DWH@SK_productid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	STGHASH!=DWH@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1, ProductFamilies join(BK_family == BK_productfamilyid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(STGFamily = SK_productfamilyid) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow2, ProductFamilies join(BK_family == BK_productfamilyid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 derive(STGFamily = SK_productfamilyid) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_productid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		productnumber as string,
		productname as string,
		SK_family as integer,
		standarcost as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		productnumber = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@productnumber,
		productname = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@productname,
		SK_family = STGFamily,
		standarcost = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@standarcost,
		SK_productid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@SK_productid
	)) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_productid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		productnumber as string,
		productname as string,
		SK_family as integer,
		standarcost as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_productid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_productid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@SK_productid,
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		productnumber = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@productnumber,
		productname = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@productname,
		SK_family = STGFamily,
		standarcost = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@standarcost
	)) ~> sink2
